original_text: And he did what was evil in the sight of the Lord, as his fathers had done. He did not depart from the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, which he made Israel to sin.
korean_text: 그의 조상들의 행위대로 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하여 이스라엘로 범죄하게 한 느밧의 아들 여로보암의 죄에서 떠나지 아니한지라

sentences.original_text: And he did what was evil in the sight of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 주님 보시기에 악한 일을 행하였고

sentences.original_text: He did not depart from the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 느밧의 아들 여로보암의 죄에서 떠나지 아니하였으니

sentences.original_text: which he made Israel to sin.
